channel.title: [PI] Playerrights
channel.description:
Hey, In my server in the commands.java, there is this:
if(c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2) {
So every command that a admin can, can a mod do to. How can I change this? I have playerrights 3 and I can't do ::item because it stands in the playerrights 1 and 2. Thanks

item.title: [PI] Playerrights
item.dc:creator: @josh225 josh225
item.description:
@josh225 wrote:

just like to point out playerRights 4 is hidden admin. memberStatus is donator

Read full topic

item.description:
@_Nathan1 wrote:

Post the last thing you edited…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Playerrights
item.dc:creator: @harnas harnas
item.description:
@harnas wrote:

The last thing I did was this.
if(c.playerRights == 1 ) {
Mod commands here
if(c.playerRights == 2 ) {
Admin commands here
The mods one wroked, but I think that I only get the error by the admin ones

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Playerrights
item.dc:creator: @_Nathan1 $Nathan
item.description:
@_Nathan1 wrote:

[quote=“harnas, post:6, topic:400811”]No, because player rights 4 is donator.
But how should I get rid of the error?
I tried this:
if(c.playerRights == 1 ) {
Mod commands here
if(c.playerRights == 2 ) {
Admin commands here
But I always got an error
Here is the error:
[/quote]:fp
You closed wrong, you need to add another } at the end of the last thing you edited.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Playerrights
item.dc:creator: @josh225 josh225
item.description:
@josh225 wrote:

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:4, topic:400811”][quote author=Shadowspkin link=topic=497867.msg3640876#msg3640876 date=1308996351]
Make it

if(c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) {

And then you can use it… that was making it so only Mod and Admin could use and not owner…
[/quote]

If you wanna take a rank out say Moderator it would look like this

or you could do it easily

this means anyone above mod can use the command but not mod’s

if it looked like this

or

the >= 1 means if playerRights are greater than or equal to 1 (mod’s) they can use the command

and obviously the > 0 means if they have staff positions they can use the command

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:2, topic:400811”]Make it

if(c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) {

And then you can use it… that was making it so only Mod and Admin could use and not owner…[/quote]

e.g: If “demote” is owner only, a mod can demote?

item.title: [PI] Playerrights
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Make it

if(c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) {

And then you can use it… that was making it so only Mod and Admin could use and not owner…
